title: Question about new rank fill
body:
Its changing so that you go to lower elo games when filled. Right? So question:
Since you are expected to carry lower elo players (who may not fully understand any calls you make)does that earn you extra LP? 
If you are filled sup and CAN'T carry, do you still loose more LP than normal?

A Rioter response would put this to rest for me, but anyone else is good too.
